text: Just lemme... lemme catch my breath...
Phew... Glad there's *someone* who gives me a break...
In this housing economy!? I... I wish.
I- you- but- shut up! I-I'm not dumb!

Alright, I'm good now. I work at a dry-wallmart, 
and the new guy didn't show up. The manager made me cover his shift.

I know this is kinda coming out of nowhere, but... do you ever 
get the feeling that your life isn't going how you planned it?
If it were easy, huh...? I never thought of it that way.

Wow, that went by fast! Probably in part cause I was late, 
but I had a lot of fun, too! Let's do this again some time!

Right!? Sometimes it even feels like breathing is gonna 
get me yelled at.
I feel a little better now, thanks! See you later!

What's your damage!? If you're trying 
to be encouraging, that's not how you do it!

Well, I'm glad I didn't get here on time. 
Would've sucked spending more time with you today. Ciao.
